rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APG4002, APG4022, APG5002, APG5022, ATS1002, ATS1022, ATS2002, ATS2022}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1905}

description: This unit continues the overview of the important sentence structures of modern standard Chinese begun in Chinese introductory for background speakers 1. It continues to provide training in formal grammatical structures and vocabulary to further develop students' literacy.  An oral component is also included. This unit continues to provide students with a basic critical understanding of Chinese society, its values and their evolutions.
